definition: an inclined surface connecting two levels, make receptive or willing towards an action or attitude or belief
details:
noun
- an inclined surface connecting two levels
= synonyms: ramp
- an elevated geological formation
= synonyms: side, slope
verb
- make receptive or willing towards an action or attitude or belief
= example: make receptive or willing towards an action or attitude or belief
= synonyms: dispose
- feel favorably disposed or willing
= example: feel favorably disposed or willing
- be at an angle
= synonyms: pitch
- lower or bend the head or upper body, as in a nod or bow
= example: lower or bend the head or upper body, as in a nod or bow
- bend or turn one's ear towards a speaker in order to listen well
= example: bend or turn one's ear towards a speaker in order to listen well
- have a tendency or disposition to do or be something
= example: have a tendency or disposition to do or be something
= synonyms: run
